thread.title: Adam Mckenna
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Adam Mckenna

author: Adam Mckenna
title: Adam Mckenna
text:
Moe helped us find and purchase the perfect bed for our new home. This was a big investment for us and he made the process so simple. The fact that he was abe to offer us a king size for the same price as a queen (no joke!) was icing on the cake. We now have a beautiful and comfy bed to enjoy! Thanks Gardner White and Moe!
Adam & Shawna
